skills.skill: Knowledge of Loan Processing Laws and Regulations
Knowledge of Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, Ginnie Mae, QM and Jumbo Guidelines

duties_responsibilities.duty: Communicate federal, state, and local levels of loan processing laws and regulations in a non-technical and conversational manner.
Utilize knowledge of Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, Ginnie Mae, QM and Jumbo guidelines.
Be familiar with NMLS ID and meet all licensing requirements.
